Articles.Content:
sorry if this has been suggested.

can we get to choose the rotation of our solar panels?

i often incorporat solar panels into the look of my ships and dont want them turning.

i know they only catch the light on one side, i just want the option to turn off the tracking and make them return to their original positions.

I'd be okay with this, even though I'd probably never use it...or very rarely.

I'm always down for more ways to customize...anything, really.
